amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to implement the proposed Air Traffic Control Optimum Training Solution of the Federal Aviation Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2796 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2796 proposed by Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S11312-11313; text: CR S11312) To prohibit the use of funds to implement the proposed Air Traffic Control Optimum Training Solution of the Federal Aviation Administration.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2796 proposed by Senator Inhofe.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2796 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
